snippet.title: Best phones
snippet.description: Looking for phones? CNET's reviews of the best phones include photos, video, and user reviews.

snippet.title: New LG G Flex ad: Gag reflex?
snippet.description: So LG would like you to believe its new phone is so human that you can, um, talk to the hand.

snippet.title: Don't blink or you'll miss this 'Guardians of the Galaxy' teaser
snippet.description: It used to be that a movie was teased with a trailer, and then debuted. Disney seems to be starting a trend in which even the trailers themselves get their own trailers.

snippet.title: LG Rumor Reflex (Sprint)
snippet.description: As a feature phone, the Rumor Reflex can do the basics well and its QWERTY keyboard and touch-screen display make it easy to use.

snippet.title: Don't blink! FireChat takes ephemeral messaging to whole new level
snippet.description: Built with the sole purpose of allowing mobile messaging without cell service or Internet, FireChat has grown into a rabbit hole somewhere between SnapChat and Chatroulette.

snippet.title: LG Rumor Reflex (Boost Mobile)
snippet.description: As a feature phone, the Rumor Reflex can do the basics well and its QWERTY keyboard and touch-screen display make it easy to use.

snippet.title: Wink glasses fog up in a flash, forcing you to blink
snippet.description: These specs might help computer vision syndrome. Or just make you look totally dorky.

snippet.title: Netflix's blink-and-you-missed-it 'Hemlock Grove' to return
snippet.description: Netflix greenlights a shorter second season of the supernatural horror thriller that flew under the radar, sandwiched between the hyper-hyped "Arrested Development" and critical darling "House of Cards."

snippet.title: Blink-WebKit split endangers some browser features
snippet.description: Developers may have to adapt to browsers that lose features, such as CSS Variables, as Google and Apple part ways in browser development.

snippet.title: Firefox 23 nixes support for outdated blink HTML tag
snippet.description: The blink tag was popular in the 1990s when Web sites would show blinking text. Since then, it has fallen out of favor.
